forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 63F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
